tika-s0404t26:2_2: Dasame janitasminti kammakilesehi nibbatte, jane etasminti vā janetasmiṁ, manussesūti attho.
tika-s0404t26:2_4: Janitasmiṁ-saddo eva vā i-kārassa e-kāraṁ katvā “janetasmi”nti vutto.
tika-s0404t26:2_6: Janitasminti sāmaññaggahaṇepi yattha catuvaṇṇasamaññā, tattheva manussaloke.
tika-s0404t26:2_7: Khattiyo seṭṭhoti ayaṁ lokasamaññāpi manussalokeyeva, na devakāye brahmakāye vāti dassetuṁ “ye gottapaṭisārino”ti vuttaṁ.
tika-s0404t26:2_8: Paṭisarantīti “ahaṁ gotamo, ahaṁ kassapo”ti paṭi paṭi attano gottaṁ anussaranti paṭijānanti vāti attho.
